1.content:
This is the girl that will be the main focus of the humiliation in the story. Other girls can be woven in, but the chapterline will follow this girl's embarrassment.

#1 - Jazmin: Jazmin tries to be a stereotypical tough punk girl at her local high school, Jefferson High. She's a short latina girl, so her skin is a bit tan, and her figure is not imposing. Her face is pretty, but usually infected with resting bitch face. Her hair is naturally straight and black, falling down to just past her shoulders, with the ends being dyed blue. Complete with black eyeliner, a nose ring, and dark clothing, she looks quite tough to some. Unfortunately, Jazmin's clothes, while dark, are hindered by one factor: she has the biggest bubble butt in the entire school, including teachers. All of her jeans, leggings, and shorts when she rarely decides to wear them, are tight around her big wobbling booty. Her big breasts also means that her shirts are often taut as well. But where her facade really cracks is her underwear. Jazmin, while wanting to look tough, is a sucker for bright, colorful panties. Her entire underwear drawer consists of bright pinks, yellows, white, rainbows, hearts, unicorns, and the like - her bras are no exception. She manages to keep up appearances by bullying other girls, despite her embarrassing secret, but who knows how long that can last?

Jazmin has a younger sister, Cindy, who inherited the same big-bottomed genes and bullying tendencies Jazmin did (although Jazmin's wobbling booty is larger by a wide margin). Currently, Cindy knows not to mess with her older sister, but that would certainly change if she knew her tough older sibling was really a wimpy girly-girl.

#2 - Rosa: Rosa is another latina woman, but not a high schooler. She's a police officer for the local police department, with a massive reputation for being a badass. Every criminal she's ever brought in has been either thoroughly wedgied, spanked cherry red, stripped to their underwear, or worse. All of her co-workers know not to cross her, unless they want to end up in a bra-connection wedgie for the rest of the day. She's a bit slender, with smaller breasts and a much smaller butt than Jazmin, although it is plenty shapely. She has wavy, slightly curly black hair falling down past her shoulders, and a mean face. But her whole demeanor changes when she gets home, taking off her black jeans and leather jacket, revealing her pink "Princess" panties with hearts, or other similarly girly apparel, and hops on her fluffy pink bed with her stuffed animals. If anyone from work - criminal or co-worker - found out about her home life, she would be completely mortified. But she can't go forever without slipping up.

#3 - Kady: Kady is a tough girl's tough girl. She runs a small local criminal organization of stolen cars and car parts. She was just a low-ranking member, but when she pantsed the former leader and hung her up by her panties, the rest of the crew - about five or so other tough girls - unanimously voted for her to lead from that point forward. She has long wavy black hair and a pretty face with sharp features, which is intimidating when it needs to be. Her figure is decently curvy, with large breasts and an average bouncy butt. She wears similarly tough clothing; leather jackets, black jeans, black boots, and the like. But, like the rest of the girls, her weakness lies in her underwear. Kady has never even worn a thong in her life, and her big full-back panties have all the colors of the rainbow, including the rainbow itself. Particularly embarrassing are her panties with phrases like "Punish Me" or "Naughty" written across them.

Kady owns an apartment where she lives with her younger sister, Brielle, a very popular bully at Jefferson High, where Jazmin attends. Brielle and Kady don't look like sisters at all - where Kady has black wavy hair, Brielle has straight blonde hair. Kady's butt is decently big, but Brielle's is a bubble butt only a bit smaller than Jazmin's. Finally, Kady's face can be mean, but Brielle has a trademark popular girl evil pretty face that makes nerds nervous whenever they see her. Brielle knows what Kady does, but never really pays much attention. But if Kady's secret was revealed to her, Brielle's bullying instincts might take an interest.

#4 - Sara: Sara is a professional wrestler, famous in the whole city for being undefeated by any challengers, easily defeating them and mocking them in the process. However, when she's out of the ring and her fights aren't scripted, things are much different. Sara is a bit of a tall girl, already making her a bit more intimidating. Her figure is nice, curvy, and fit, complete with big breasts and a very bouncy bubble butt. She has long straight brown hair that goes down to the middle of her back. While she has a similarly embarrassing underwear collection to the other three girls, her wardrobe isn't as dark or "tough". While her panties are still humiliating, her real humiliation comes from the fact that she is a massive crybaby. If she was pantsed, or put over another girl's knee for ten seconds, she would whine, cry, and moan like a total wimp. So far, she's been able to talk the writers into not letting it happen on stage, but they won't let it go on forever, and they can't save her in her personal life.

Who's going to have their cheeks blush in this story?
1.title: The Unlucky Girl

12.content:
"Do you wanna ask me that again?" Rosa smirked, one hand firmly gripping her co-workers white panties, yanking them up to her shoulders. The victim, a black-haired woman named Amy, shook her head, "No, ma'am, I'm sorry!" "Good," Rosa laughed, yanking Amy's pants to the floor. "Meet me in the bathroom at lunch for your swirly." Amy blushed at how loud Rosa spoke, but simply nodded her head, "Yes ma'am, I will." Rosa gave her one last spank to send her stumbling away, pants at her ankles.

Rosa felt like a queen at work. Everyone treated her nicely, gave her their food, and complimented her. Every cop, including the Chief of Police, respected her for fear of a humiliating punishment. Her day went smoothly, mostly dealing with paperwork and giving out wedgies when she got bored. But soon the night came to an end, and the only ones left in the office were her, Amy, and their secretary, Catherine.

Amy was a bit shorter than Rosa, and much more mild-mannered. She had a cute round face, a slender figure, and a sizable butt held tightly in suit pants. Catherine was about as tall as Rosa was, with a pretty face and long, slightly wavy brunette hair. Her frame was a bit thicker, especially on her big bottom, which was always tightly wedgied with her jeans, thanks to Rosa.

"Well," Amy said softly, getting up gingerly due to her earlier spanking. Her hair was almost dry as she spoke: "I think I'm going to head home now. Do you guys need anything before I go?" Catherine shook her head, and Amy looked to Rosa.

121.content:

For the first time, Rosa's threat fell flat as Amy just condescendingly shook her head. "Even if that were true, which it's not, it wouldn't matter." "Oh yeah?" Rosa crossed her arms. "Why's that?" "Because all it takes is one time, princess." Amy smirked as Rosa blushed at the word 'princess'. "I pants you one time, wedgie you one time, and word is out. Everyone you've ever bullied in this whole precinct will humiliate you forever. You won't be allowed to wear your clothes, you'll be spanked by everybody, given swirlies every hour. We'll probably throw you in with some prisoners just to watch them wedgie you. After all, they love sissies."

"I am not a sissy!" Rosa protested, a hint of whining in her voice; she knew she was losing all control of the situation. "No? Then how come I just gave you a wedge in a pair of pink panties that have 'Pretty princess' written on them?" Rosa clenched her jaw, but had no reply other than to blush deeper. "That's what I thought." Amy smirked. "You're not some badass cop. You're a wimpy, sissy, girly-girl. Aren't you?" "No!" "No what?" "No I am not a wimpy sissy girly-girl!" Rosa protested, blushing at the words coming out of her mouth.

"Oh, really? Hmm, interesting," Amy said casually before reaching one hand forward and gripping the front of Rosa's panties, yanking up, causing the mean girl to gasp loudly as her jaw dropped, hands shooting between her legs. "How about now?" Rosa simply shook her head, embarrassed, but not yet willing to admit defeat. "Okay, playing tough, huh? That's fine." Amy smiled, tying her hair up in a ponytail. "I was going to let this happen the easy way, but the hard way is definitely more fun!" Rosa looked worried, yelping as she was spun around quickly and given another wedgie, the embarrassing panties shooting between her shapely cheeks, covering the back of her leather jacket in the colorful material.

"Ah! How are you so good at giving wedgies?" Rosa gasped, leaning on a stall for support, her hips stuck out due to Amy's tight grip on her panties. "I was a cheerleader in high school. I wedgied wimps like you all the time. I just heard about your reputation when I got here, and I can't believe I didn't see right through them!" "I am not a wimp," Rosa protested, standing up straight. Unfortunately she was bent right back over again when Amy yanked up on her panties harder. "Owie!" She cried, one hand reaching to her backside to ease the pain of the wedgie. "Yeah. Totally not a wimp," Amy rolled her eyes as she gave another one-handed yank.

Rosa sighed and felt relief when she felt her panties snap down again, but felt even more embarrassment as she felt her jeans get ripped to her ankles instantly. "Shirt off, too." Amy smiled. "I am not taking my shirt- okay, shirt off, got it," Rosa protested at first, but agreed when she felt Amy's hand back on her panties. "Wiiiiimp," Amy smiled in a sing-songy voice as Rosa obeyed, taking off her leather jacket and shirt, revealing a bright pink bra underneath, causing Amy to laugh loudly. "Wow, pink bra, too! How did I not see that coming?" Rosa just crossed her arms, turning around at Amy.

"Still don't want to admit it?" Amy asked. "I am not a wimp! I'm definitely not a sissy, either!" "So, girly-girl, then?" Rosa just blushed. "You know, I still have half a mind to spank you right here and dunk your head in that toilet, Amy." Rosa threatened. "Tsk tsk tsk. Oh, Rosa. You don't have control anymore. Lay one finger on me, and everyone learns about the pretty princess' little secret, okay?" Rosa clenched her jaw and avoided eye contact, knowing she was completely cornered. "I asked you a question, wimp." Amy said, turning Rosa around and giving another fierce wedgie. "Ooh! Okay, okay! Got it!" "Mmmm, not good enough. Make it a bit better for me," Amy teased, yanking up again.

"Okay! I got it, ma'am?" "Better," Amy mused before giving an even harder tug. "How about you call yourself a pretty princess now?" "What? Amy, I am not - owie! Okay, okay! I'm a pretty princess!" "Louder!" "I'm a pretty princess!' Rosa cried, She blushed deeply at the fact that Amy was supposed to be getting a swirly right now. But instead, she had been stripped, insulted, wedgied, and was now humiliating herself on behalf of Amy.

"Good! Now that we have that out of the way, princess," Amy teased, picking Rosa's wedgie and slapping her ass. "Toilet bowl. Now." Rosa turned around, half-mad, half-worried. "What? Seriously, Amy? Come on!" "Next time, I'm not going to remind you that I can ruin your reputation instantly. I know you're into Roya. Imagine if she saw you in pink panties, getting a wedgie like a wimp. Wouldn't that be humiliating?" Rosa nodded slowly. "Good! Now, head in the toilet bowl. After every swirly, you're going to count and call yourself a sissy princess. Okay?" Rosa paused for a moment as she got onto her knees, but eventually relented: "Okay."

"29, I'm a sissy princess! 30, I'm a sissy princess!" Rosa gasped, hands grasping the toilet seat as she breathed heavily, water trickling down her body from her messy wet hair, stuck to her face. "Good! Now to deal with your attitude problem. But first, put your clothes back on. I think it's funnier to see the pretty pink contrast with the dark black you wear to try to seem cool." Amy put her down gently, leading Rosa to let out a sigh of relief. "Then what are you?" Rosa closed her eyes, sighing. "I'm a wimp." "Who's a real bully?" "You are, Amy," Rosa said through gritted teeth, partly from her current wedgie, but mostly from the humiliation of defeat.

"Good girl! Now, for the finishing touch!" Rosa gasped, blushing at the camera as Amy pulled higher and higher on the panties before finally snapping the pink and lacy waistband over Rosa's head, leaving the tough girl in the leather jacket open-mouthed and blushing, closing her eyes in shame as Amy slapped her ass freely.

"How do you like your crown, sissy princess?" "I love it?" Rosa asked pathetically, whimpering as she was turned around, sticking her butt out to the camera due to the wedgie, her embarrassing panties exposed to the camera, stretched out over her head and back to perfectly read "Pretty Princess", even at a distance. She felt like it couldn't get any worse than being humiliated by the girl she came in here to give a swirly to. But somehow, it does! How?

13.content:
Kady had just about finished her share of work for the day. It had been mostly slow, with a few customers stopping by. One of her girls had returned empty-handed, so Kady set an example by stripping her down to her bra and panties for the rest of the day, giving her a shoulder wedgie and ordering her to come to work exactly like that the next day. The rest of the crew got a lot of laughs from it, and Kady felt secure in her position as leader.

She headed home without further incident, and saw when she opened the door that Brielle had invited a girl from school over. "Hey loser, who's this?" Kady teased, motioning to the other girl. "This, my dorky sister, is Jazmin. We met while hanging this total girly-girl up in the bathroom," Brielle replied with a big smile, prompting Jazmin to laugh. Kady laughed softly and nodded, "Good girl. Keep it up." Before she headed to the fridge to grab a drink before heading to her room for the night.

1313.content:
Three weeks had passed since Kady was given a wedgie in her own kitchen. At first, it was a lot of the same. Brielle would boss her around a bit, give her wedgies, pants her, but it was somewhat manageable. But as time passed, things got worse and worse for the badass thief. Brielle started inviting more and more friends over, humiliating and embarrassing Kady to more and more high schoolers. Thankfully, Brielle had established that no phones or pictures were allowed for the sake of keeping her reputation intact. Kady was glad Brielle was enough of a bully to scare her classmates into keeping the secret, but not glad about how it meant Kady was being bullied so expertly.

The only good thing to come of the whole mess was that Kady's employees were working much harder. Kady channeled her stress from Brielle into her work, employing mandatory daily spankings for her workers that were delivered in front of the other girls. The humiliating prospect of getting another spanking on top of the first was enough to make sure her employees were doing the best work possible.

Kady was actually having a good day at work, until she got a call from Brielle. She hurried into her office in the shop, closing and locking the door behind her before answering. "Hello, ma'am," Kady blushed as she spoke, but that was how she was told to answer the phone. "What? No, please, not the cheerleaders again! Yes it's because they're mean! And they spank really hard! No that's not what a wimp would say! No I was not crying the last time they spanked me!" Kady winced, closing her eyes. "Yes ma'am, I do know better than to raise my voice at you. Of course ma'am, I know I will be spanked for being disrespectful. Is there anything else you wanted to tell me before you go, ma'am? A package? Absolutely, I'll keep an eye out for it. Yes, I know I'm a wimp. Love you, bye." Kady rolled her eyes, putting her phone on her desk and rubbing her butt through her jeans, still sore from her morning spanking.

Kady jumped at the sudden sound of knocking at her door, fitting in some last rubs before crossing her arms. "Come in!" She called. One of her workers came in with a box. "Here you go, ma'am. A package came while you were in here." Kady nodded, grabbing the box. "Good. Now go, back to work!" She said, giving the girl a slap on the ass as she skirted out of the room.

"Brielle, this is ridiculous!" Kady protested, crossing her arms as she stood in front of her younger sister. "I think it's great," Brielle smiled, taking a drink from the glass of water Kady had gotten her. "Great? This is the skimpiest maid outfit ever! The top is like a lingerie bra that shows so much of my boobs, and the bottom doesn't even cover half my panties! It's like a skirt belt!" Brielle laughed, nodding, "Exactly! Speaking of the panties that came with it, what do those say again?" Kady rolled her eyes, turning around, exposing her red bottom to her younger sister, clad in yellow panties that read "Naughty Maid!" with a pink heart as the dot on the 'i'. Kady especially hated these panties, because she was hoping they would at least be a plain white to match the rest of the outfit. But no, instead they contrasted as a bright yellow, sticking out like a sore thumb. "Oh, right!" Brielle mused happily. "I think it suits you!" Kady groaned as she turned around to face Brielle, "Come on, sis! This is nothing like I did to you!" "Yeah, because I'm not some sissy wimp! You're the one who taught me that girly-girls get humiliated." "That is not fair, Brielle!" Kady whined. "Please don't make me serve the cheerleaders like this!"

Brielle laughed loudly at that, "This again? What, are you scared the high schoolers are gonna make fun of you? Sorry sis, but it is way too late to avoid that. Now turn around, I wanna give you a wedgie." Kady whimpered, but obeyed, turning herself around and stepping back towards the sitting Brielle, wincing as the white, extremely stretchy, panties were yanked up from under the short maid skirt. Kady groaned and moaned, shifting uncomfortably in the white high heels that came with the maid outfit, having to go even further onto her tip-toes as Brielle pulled the panties higher and higher.

After a few long minutes of wedgies, Brielle let the panties snap down, still wedged firmly between Kady's round cheeks. "All right, now for your spanking for raising your voice to me on the phone." "Oh, come on! I didn't mean to!" Kady pleaded, but Brielle's face was firm. Kady stomped a heel in protest before walking forward, yelping as Brielle pulled the older girl over her knee.

"Ow! Ouch! Owww! Owie! Ow! Ow-how-how-howww!" Kady whined as Brielle's firm hand came down over and over on her already-tenderized rear end. Brielle giggled, only worsening Kady's humiliation, "You'd think you'd get used to being over my knee!" Kady hung her head, speaking to the ground: "It's hard to get used to your little sister giving you a spank-iiIIING! Ooh, wedgie!" Kady gasped, kicking her legs as the white panties were once again yanked up by Brielle, getting Kady's feet off the floor as she lurched forward from the force of the wedgie.

"Let's do a little test!" Brielle smiled, giving Kady a few particularly hard final slaps. "I'm going to bully you in some way, and you're going to tell me if it's because you're a wimp, or because you're naughty girl. Okay?" Kady was hesitant to respond, but spat out a "Yes ma'am!" As Brielle gave a harsh tug to her panties. "Good!"

The first one was easy: Brielle spanked Kady ten times. "Ouchie!" She hissed, "Naughty girl." "Full sentences please!" Brielle smiled, repeating the ten spanks. "Owwwwie! I'm a naughty girl!" Brielle laughed, but said nothing before grabbing Kady's hair in a fist and pulling her head up, "I'm your little sister and you're basically my bitch!" Kady whimpered, closing her eyes as she replied: "I'm a wimp." "Good!" Brielle giggled, dropping Kady's head. Kady gasped as she felt the glass of water being dumped on her head before Brielle said, "You're not going to do anything about that." Kady spat out some water and said, "I'm a wimp!" "Very good! Last one! It's tough, so be careful!"

Kady gasped as Brielle pushed her onto the floor before she felt her panties shoot up into the sky, blushing as Brielle quickly got her into a bouncing wedgie. Kady's feet flailed pathetically underneath her as Brielle bounced her harder and harder before finally dropping her to the floor and giving her panties a final tug, leaving her in an atomic wedgie. "Naughty girl?" Kady asked pathetically, blinded by her own panties.

"It was a trick question! Both! So that makes you a...?" Kady sighed, "I'm a wimpy naughty girl." "Very good!" Brielle clapped before giving Kady a sharp slap on the ass. "My friends - the scary cheerleaders - will be here soon. Go get me more water and make us some sandwiches or something. Keep that wedgie in though, loser," Brielle smiled before picking up her phone, leaving Kady to stumble into the kitchen with a "Yes ma'am."

When Kady returned with the water, she begged Brielle one more time, "Ma'am, may I please change clothes to serve you and your cheerleader friends?"

What does Brielle say?
1313.title: Reader's choice!

info.brief_description: An interactive about girls who go from "Tough Girl" to "Girly-Girl"
info.description:
This is an interactive where girls who look/act tough, mean, intimidating, etc., end up being complete wimps, humiliated at the hands of some other girl(s) via wedgies, pantsing, teasing, you name it. Here are the only rules:

All main characters/humiliated characters must have some sort of reputation depicting them as tough or mean.

Females only

No death/intense violence (spanking, light slapping, things like that are fine)

Other than those, just have fun with it!
